definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The recipient will be left with multiple half-open connections that are occupying limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 收件人將留下多個半開連接佔用有限的資源。

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您預期的收件人將能夠輕鬆地解讀它。

sentences.english: The receiver's name and address of international mail should be written in English or French.
sentences.chinese: 對於國際郵件，收件人名址應用英文或法文書寫。

sentences.english: The outside of your package will only document your order and product numbers.
sentences.chinese: 商品外包裝僅會顯示收件人資訊與訂單編號。

sentences.english: They are available to a number of people other than the recipient.
sentences.chinese: 除了收件人，電子郵件是可以被許多人看到的。

sentences.english: You want to tell the receiver something, either a compliment or information.
sentences.chinese: 你想要告訴收件人某事，無論是問侯或者是信息。

sentences.english: Think about your recipient and how they’d most likely write an e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 想想收件人的風格，以及他們最可能怎樣寫電郵。

sentences.english: Different classes of addressee may also use different algorithms.
sentences.chinese: 不同類別的收件人也可以使用不同的算法。

sentences.english: And please write down the name and address of sender and receiver on the packing box.
sentences.chinese: 請在包裝箱上寫上寄件人和收件人的姓名和地址。

sentences.english: Each letter can even go to different recipients.
sentences.chinese: 每封信也可以發送給不同的收件人。

sentences.english: Finally, note that the configuration file contains the address of only one recipient.
sentences.chinese: 最後請注意，該配置文件只包含一個收件人的地址。

sentences.english: One involves having the recipient pay a COD charge; that’s “cash on delivery.”
sentences.chinese: 其一是讓收件人支付費用的“貨到付現”法。

sentences.english: Please nominate two members of staff as contact persons to receive PRPA regular correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 請提名兩位職員作聯絡人及通訊刊物收件人。

sentences.english: This message is intended solely for the named addressee.
sentences.chinese: 此消息完全是爲了指定的收件人。

sentences.english: Please input the 6 digits ID number as receivers of the training summary, use ", " between 2 IDs.
sentences.chinese: 請輸入結業總結收件人工號後6位，多人以，號分隔。

definition: to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
